snippet: More than a dozen people, including Mr. Shmurda, whose real name is Ackquille Pollard, have been held in an inquiry into shootings and drug trafficking in Brooklyn.
abstract: Bobby Shmurda, rap artist whose real name is Ackquille Pollard, is arrested in Times Square as part of investigation headed by Office of Special Narcotics Prosecutor for New York City into street violence, shootings and drug trafficking in Brooklyn; more than 13 people are arrested and other suspects are being sought, but charges remain unspecified.
lead_paragraph: More than a dozen people, including Mr. Shmurda, whose real name is Ackquille Pollard, have been held in an inquiry into shootings and drug trafficking in Brooklyn.

headline.main: Bobby Shmurda, Rap Artist, Is Arrested in Manhattan
headline.print_headline: A Rap Artist Is Among 13 Under Arrest in an Inquiry
